Message.Title: Ebay is now limiting how many items sellers can post
Message.Msg: Ebay has now placed drastic limits on the number of products that are available for sale. Sellers are limited to how many items per month they are permitted to list. Even if sellers have been with Ebay for years, it doesn't matter. If they go over their limit, which Ebay hasn't defined, then the listings are removed. I'm certain Amazon will be thrilled to hear about this.

Topic.Title: Ebay is now limiting how many items sellers can post

Message.Msg: This is nothing new. eBay has had selling limits for years now. However, this is only for non-store owners. As far as I know, sellers with premium or anchor stores have no limit.
